entries.start_convo_1: Do you have orders for me, sir?
entries.confused: I'm afraid I fail to comprehend your meaning, sir.
entries.start_convo_4: Very well, sir. And what word shall I listen for?
entries.end_convo: Very well, sir. Upon hearing that command, I shall endeavor to obey.
entries.command_reply_1: I need to teach you a command.
entries.start_convo_2: I am more than capable of obeying your orders, sir. What sort of command do you need me to learn?
entries.which_command: Sir, which command do you wish to instruct me in?
entries.taming_toofar: You are too far away to continue taming.
entries.taming_fail: You fail to tame the creature.
entries.pet_wounded_health: Oh dear, I do believe that my motivators are damaged.
entries.pet_wounded_mind: Goodness, I've taken some terrible abuse!
